WRITING.TEXT:
So yeah we know there dickheads. but wow,they now must have zero fucks left to give.
So i was waiting for a signed contract with a payment cashiers cheque attached to it. well over 20k on it.
Sent registered post and insured so that nothing would happen to it and need a signature.
I was not home.
So what's the aus post driver do?..
Went to my next door neighbour,who i don't really know or anything apart from the occasional man nod to.
Goes this is for next door can you sign it.
WHAT?.
So aus post let a random no body sign for something that was mine. They are meant to leave a note for me to come collect it.
I mean yeah i got the letter.. mind you only today. even though they got it on friday.
But holy fuck that is some piss poor fucking security it's a legal court document with a cashiers cheque attached..
Lol.. i this evening went to the LPO and told them off and that ive reported them to the ombudsman. Cause that shit should not happen.
Dear Aus post. Are you bi-polar or something?. Every other day of the week even if im fucking home ur drivers dash and run or just straight up put a note in my letter box to come collect it. But this time you go next door with a envelope that IN STAMPED BLAZIN BOLD writing. MUST BE SIGNED FOR BY NAMED Recipient WITH A COMMONWEALTH GOVT LOGO RIGHT IN THE MIDDLE... Nah mate fuck this dude aye imma fuck his shit up aye?
